name: Big Mom's Tea Party
description: A devilish tea party with guests from all over the world.

name: Jazz Fest
description: We will be hosting a collection of the town's best jazz artists and musicians.

name: Community Day
description: Come join us at the park for tons of live music, food trucks, artists, street performers, and more! Bring the whole family, and yes that means the dog too!

name: Pelotonia
description: The James Cancer Center at OSU will be hosting their annual ride to raise funds for cancer awareness and research.
location: Various locations. New Albany, OH starting zone.

name: Corey's Birthday
description: Join us in celebrating the 50th birthday of our beloved Corey.

name: Superbowl Party
description: Come by to see the Bills beat the Cheifs in this year's must-see matchup! There will be beers and food for all. BYOB for bourbon though. Thanks in advance.
